data.title: Angry Butterfly
data.meta_description: View The One Show awards spanning over 50 years, including winners of the coveted Gold Pencil, one of the creative industry's top prizes.
data.text:
The One Show

The One Show is the world's most prestigious award show in advertising and design. For over 50 years, the Gold Pencil has been regarded as one of the top prizes in the creative industry. The One Show has a rich legacy of honoring some of the most groundbreaking ideas, created by some of the most remarkable minds in creativity.

One Show 2023 Cultural Driver Jury

Raul Garcia

Executive Creative Director

Angry Butterfly

Toronto

Raul is an internationally awarded Executive Creative Director / Art Director / Instructor (Miami Ad School) with over 23 years of experience working for agencies in Toronto, Vancouver, Calgary, New York City, San Francisco and Los Angeles. His work has been featured on the front page of the Toronto Star, landed on the front page of Reddit (twice), was spoofed by the Canadian television satire comedy show The Mercer Report, has been the subject of international news and talk radio, and has been blogged by numerous celebrities including 50 cent, Pharrell Williams, Rosario Dawson and Zoe Kravitz. For one of his most recent projects, Raul and team created an experiential idea that inspired Lizzo to create artwork with her backside. Raul has earned recognition in almost every national (Canadian) and international award show. Some of his highlights include a Grand Effie, a D&AD Black Pencil, a Titanium Cannes Lion, and Cassies Grand Prix. Currently, Raul can be found working at the newly opened Angry Butterfly helping to solidify their creative offering. Outside of advertising, Raul is a big video game junkie. In 2013, he was ranked 51st overall in Call of Duty Black ops 2 (for about 15 minutes).
